response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. This product is truly a masterpiece, offering unparalleled benefits and capabilities that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I am offering it to you for $18,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value I see in it being utilized by someone who can appreciate and benefit from its full potential. I trust that you will find its value exceeds this investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 18000}
